text: Desi Arnaz (Desiderio Alberto Arnaz y de Acha III, March 2, 1917 - December 2, 1986) was a Cuban-born American actor, bandleader, and film and television producer. He is known for playing Ricky Ricardo in I Love Lucy. He was born in Santiago de Cuba, Cuba.Desi Arnaz Biography (1917-1986) He was married to Lucille Ball from 1940 until they divorced in 1960. They had a son named Desi Jr, and a daughter named Lucie. Then he was married to Edith Mack Hirsh from 1963 until her death in 1985. Arnaz died from lung cancer in Del Mar, California, on December 2, 1986.
